title: You're Bald...

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: You're serious? Just turn everyone bald! BALD JUSTICE!!!

desc:
Post 4865
Lcorp Zayin
Threat 1
When visited the target becomes bald
When visited again by the same person, everyone of the faction the visitor is from becomes bald
When visited yet again by the same person, everyone in the game becomes bald
Baldness has only one mechanical effect, other than being a night result for the target
Once someone is bald, they may not multitask at all anymore.
